text: Hi all, do any one have idea how to use HubSpot-api-python package to fetch custom objects data. I followed the HubSpot documentation (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/crm-custom-objects> Search method "POST*`/crm/v3/objects/{objectType}/search`*" ) but not able to import PublicObjectSearchRequest from from HubSpot.crm package.
Did anybody else get issues with oauth authentication the past 3hours? (it's working now)

Hello everyone :wave:
I'm new to using `HubSpot` api.
Right now I'm facing this issue of OAuth in node.

Using this method
```HubSpotClient.oauth.tokensApi.createToken(
      AUTHORIZATION_CODE,
      AUTH_CODE,
      REDIRECT_URI,
      CLIENT_ID,
      CLIENT_SECRET
    );```
The issue here is I don't understand where do I get `AUTH_CODE`  from
Can anyone help me.
Thanks

Hey all, I am trying to push data to a database from HubSpot using webhooks. i have my subscription set to a contact property change. The webhook posts to a lambda function (aws serverless function) via a api gateway. The webhooks pay load is logged to my database and the lambda function returns a 201 response but on the HubSpot side it is logged as a 502 response. Because of the 502 response, the app triggers the webhook again which is causing duplicatwes in mydatabase.
Any suggestions on what I should respond to the webhook with?

Just joined and have a question regarding the API.

We have a web application and a HubSpot website.  Our marketing team would like to manage a page within the application that will share general information from a page on the HubSpot site.  Is it possible to create an app within HubSpot to get the information from a page (or content?) and display it within the app? Does this sound like something the API can do?
Hi, Can anyone please help me in updating a contact by email address?
